name: Blooms Fury
description:
BLOOM THE ENEMIES APART!

Play different levels. Fight different types of enemies!

ENDLESS Mode also included!

The astonishing effects of this game will make you want to play more. Kill all enemies to play the next level. Difficulty increases! Download Bloom's Fury today and have fun! 

Plus, practice your skills in the Endless mode and set a High Score.

Have Fun! ✌
